title: Rail Maze - Android Wear
summary: Solve train puzzles, build railroads, explode obstacles, escape PIRATE trains.
developerAddress:
Spooky House Studios UG (haftungsbeschränkt)
Otto-Schmidt-Str. 9
04425 Taucha, Germany
description: Solve 100+ of challenging and unique puzzles, build railroads, bomb through obstacles, escape PIRATES on rails. Have a lot of fun with this new and unique puzzle game. Features: * 100+ puzzles * Tunnels * Bombs * PIRATE trains * Super long trains * Global online scoreboards by Scoreloop * 4 game modes: LABYRINTH - Puzzle, BUILD RAILROAD - Action, SNAKE - Action, LONGEST RAILROAD - Puzzle Action Get Rail Maze now! PRESS REVIEWS: “Rail Maze is an amazing puzzle game that will give you so many different options, youll be busy playing it for hours” – AppAdvice.com “The biggest one is the change of art style, which – as you can see from the comparison screens below – is more honed and cowboy-like”- PocketGamer.com "Rail Maze, with over 100 levels and thousands of downloads, certainly seems to be one of the hotter casual games out there at the moment." - Gamezebo.com “If puzzle games are your thing, you wont want to miss this one” – App Advice.com
descriptionHTML:
Solve 100+ of challenging and unique puzzles, build railroads, bomb through obstacles, escape PIRATES on rails. Have a lot of fun with this new and unique puzzle game.

Features:

* 100+ puzzles
* Tunnels
* Bombs
* PIRATE trains
* Super long trains
* Global online scoreboards by Scoreloop
* 4 game modes:
LABYRINTH - Puzzle,
BUILD RAILROAD - Action,
SNAKE - Action,
LONGEST RAILROAD - Puzzle Action

Get Rail Maze now!

PRESS REVIEWS:

“Rail Maze is an amazing puzzle game that will give you so many different options, youll be busy playing it for hours” – AppAdvice.com

“The biggest one is the change of art style, which – as you can see from the comparison screens below – is more honed and cowboy-like”- PocketGamer.com

"Rail Maze, with over 100 levels and thousands of downloads, certainly seems to be one of the hotter casual games out there at the moment."
- Gamezebo.com

“If puzzle games are your thing, you wont want to miss this one” – App Advice.com
comments: Great game but please make it work on round screens! The controls get cut off so it's almost unplayable. With this fix it would certainly be a five star app
Cool concept It's a cool concept, but it doesn't work on the LG Urbane. Other spooky house games work on round screens, so this is kind of a let down.
Addicting It worked well with the Asus Zen Watch 2. Done levels were pretty easy others took much longer to figure out. Overall a nice game to kill some time
Doesn't work on round screens Cuts off outer edges to where it's not playable such a good game for a watch but u can't even play it cuase cuts off outer edges on moto 360 such a dissapointment
Incompatible with round screen! The game takes the touch screen to the outer round edge where it is not playable!
Almost 2018 - Still unplayable with round screens (Needed play controls are out of view on round screens). Considering no new updates since 2014, I can see why. Disappointing.
